channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: There are three (3) Large Potholes by the Parking area for the shops in Chosen Drive, 12th August
item.description:
The potholes 3 in number are situated along the car parking area of Chosen Drive by the shops nearest John Daniels Turning
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chosen Drive, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temp traffic lights not turned on, 12th August
item.description:
The temporary traffic lights have not been on for days now. It is making it very hard to cross the road with a baby. I contacted the builders and they said it’s the councils responsibility.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 247, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 12th August
item.description:
Hedge on Winterbottom Road – urgent request for trimming. I am a resident of Winterbottom Road in Cheltenham. I am writing regarding the hedge located next to your school, which has not been trimmed for a long time. The hedge extends significantly onto the road, causing serious safety concerns: Two vehicles cannot pass safely at the same time, Drivers must be very cautious to avoid damage to their vehicles, Car wing mirrors are being scratched or hit by branches. Please trim the hedge urgently and ensure regular maintenance to prevent the problem from recurring. Thank you in advance for your attention, and I look forward to a swift resolution. Kind regards, Krystian Grzegorzewski Resident of Winterbottom Road
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bottom of Paynes Pitch, 12th August
item.description:
This is to point out difficulty in leaving Croft Close due to vans parked facing up Paynes Pitch and difficulty in seeing around them. Traffic even though it is part of the 20mph zone travels in excess of 30mph sometimes over 40mph. What we would like is an extension of the double yellow lines to make egress from Croft Close safer. Also fast cars sometimes have to brake hard to prevent hitting the parked vehicles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Croft Close, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
